sub_title: Advancing human wellbeing by developing new ways to understand, measure, communicate and respond to emotions
summary:
With over 20 years of work experience basically spread between Asia and Europe, I've always pursued the road less traveled. I have a background in business administration and always retained a broad interest in business dynamics and foster a genuine curiosity in why "things are as they are". Meanwhile, I love to touch the scales of risk and return as this is what drives dreams...

I aim to combine my experience in venture capital & corporate finance with my strong interest in technology ventures where I can deploy my entrepreneurial drive to facilitate value acceleration projects for clients. Connect this competency with a passion for Asia and you can imagine me at work.

"Empires of the future are empires of the Mind" (Winston Churchill)

Specialties: venture capital, ICT, ecommerce, new media, energy, food processing, industrial manufacturing, transportation & logistics.

Our AI-based technology measures employee engagement in real-time with a leading indicator that is  based on psycho-linguistic analysis and tension detection.

We offer management insight and tools to visualise, measure and improve employee engagement with an unprecedented level of accuracy. KeenCorp changes the accountability and effectiveness of corporate leadership by addresssing "blind spots" in performance and risk that originate with perception and bias, present in every company culture by detecting weak signals in culture and groups of employees through continuous measurement of natural language with full protection of individual privacy. 

Our software is applicable in various sectors among others:

• Accountancy

• Healthcare

Together with selected associates we concentrate on venture capital, business development and corporate finance consulting. Helius operates as an entrepreneurial transformation agent and intends to leverage its expertise and network in Europe and South-East Asia. 

In this capacity I have been engaged by various clients primarily in knowledge intensive sectors such as new media, ICT, biotechnology and healthcare.
